resume.short: Being naturally curious and passionate about computers, I finish a master's at EPITECH including a year of exchange in Beijing, China. After 5 years of training in work, I was able to deepen my technical knowledge and project management abilities.
resume.detail: Today, I devote myself to web technologies, thus put my heart into offering high stable products with excellent UI / UX. In my off-work times, I'm obsessed with testing new technologies and patterns: mobile development, infrastructure configuration, machine learning.

data.title: Software Architecture: the Hard Parts
data.author: Neal Ford, Mark Richars, Zhamak Dehghani

data.title: 100 Things Every Designer Needs to Know About People
data.author: Susan M. Weinschenk

data.title: The Phoenix Project
data.author: Gene Kim, Kevin Behr George Spafford

data.description: Built a suite of apps to drive operational excellence and performance in omnichannel campaigns
details: Worked on solutions using Python, Golang, Vue, SQL, Kafka
Defined and developed quality processes according to the growth of the team's organization
Manage authentication domain accountability, collabor with clients to integrate their system
Collaborate, deliver and communicate architecture solutions

data.description: Built a web application with AngularJS and ASP.NET to visualize crop plots, forecasting and suggesting countermeasures against fungicide risks according to various parameters and provide automated reporting to each user.
Support dev team on the main application written in Ruby on Rail. Gather a large inventory of hotels through multiple providers and provide an interface in AngularJS to interact with the inventory.

data.title: Narset
data.subtitle: Web application
data.describe: Solution to handle company documentation, organization and ensure a high quality by detecting outdated document, provide a rich and intuitive editor developed with Vue, Websocket, gRPC.

data.title: Ore
data.subtitle: Mobile application
data.describe: Small utility application that allows to record tasks to be performed regularly and encourages the user to maintain their achievements via a gamified interface built with Flutter.

data.title: Hexatyla
data.subtitle: Linux strategy game
data.describe: Strategy game built by a small team as part of the end of our bachelor's degree completed in three months using a 3D engine and developed in C++. We were highly congratulated for the work made.
